overview: Stephen Upstone is co-founder and CEO of LoopMe Media. Stephen has worked in mobile advertising since 2006 as Managing Director Europe for Ad Infuse (sold to Velti) and then VP Sales and Business Development Europe for Velti after the acquisition. Stephen was at Velti for the successful NASDAQ list in 2011 and part of the senior management team in New York to ring the opening bell. Whilst at Ad Infuse & Velti Stephen created new business and opened offices in UK, France, Spain, Holland, Italy, Portugal building a multi-million dollar business across the region with leading companies such as Vodafone, Orange, T Mobile, Sky and Daily Mail. Stephen was Co-Chair of the MMA Global Advertising Committee and Member of the IAB Mobile Advertising Committee and is a frequent commentator and speaker on mobile advertising and marketing. Stephen has over 18 years experience in advertising and technology. Prior to Ad Infuse Stephen worked at Touch Clarity (sold to Omniture), FirstCapital, Universal McCann and Lowe Howard Spink.
